General Information

64th Advanced Postgraduate Course
February 17 - 19, 2017, Washington, DC

Schedule

The meeting will begin at 1:00 p.m. on Friday, February 17, 2017 and conclude at 12:15 p.m. on Sunday, February 19, 2017. The meeting will be held at the Grand Hyatt Washington in Washington, D.C.

Speaker Presentation Slides

In order to provide attendees with the most complete set of companion materials, registered attendees will be provided access to a website containing speaker presentation slides prior to the start of the meeting (those that were made available by the speakers). Attendees should print or save to their electronic device the presentations that they are interested in prior to arriving in Washington, D.C. The presentation slides will not be included in the Syllabus.  

Photography/Video 

Photography, included camera-enabled cell phones, videotaping and audio recording during the meeting is forbidden.

Shop Diabetes Store

The Shop Diabetes Store will be available during the meeting so be sure to take time to visit the store to see the array of the latest books available.

Dress Code

We encourage participants to dress comfortably in business casual attire. Temperatures in meeting rooms will vary so we suggest you bring a sweater or light jacket to the sessions. Please note that ADA will provide only a self-serve unmanned coat check. We cannot accept liability for your coat or jacket.

Saturday, February 18, 2017 - Support ADA's movement to Stop Diabetes by wearing red. Have you joined the movement? Visit www.stopdiabetes.com today!

Weather

Weather in Washington, D.C. for February averages between 31Â° and 47Â°F (-1Â° - 8Â°C), so it is advisable to bring a warm jacket. 

Non-Smoking Policy

Smoking is prohibited at all times in the meeting rooms, public areas and restrooms of the hotel. Your compliance is appreciated.

Hotel Services

  • Cabinet Restaurant (breakfast and lunch on weekends)
  • Cure Bar & Bistro Restaurant (upscale dining for lunch, dinner and late night)
  • Room Service
  • Fit Club Health Club
  • Indoor Heated Pool
  • Concierge Desk
  • 24-hour Business Center

Local Attractions

  • Verizon Center (Capitals, Wizards and Mystics)
  • White House
  • U.S. Capitol
  • Presidential Monuments/Memorials
  • War Memorials
  • Smithsonian Museums
